title: Mob Douzen No Akuyaku Reijou Wa Dansou Shite Kouryaku Taishou No Za O Nerau
alternative_title: モブ同然の悪役令嬢は男装して攻略対象の座を狙う ; Mob Douzen no Akuyaku Reijou wa Dansou Shite Kouryaku Taishou no Za o Nerau ; The Villainess Who Is No Better than an Extra Cross-Dresses to Be a Love Interest
status: モブ同然の悪役令嬢は男装して攻略対象の座を狙う ; Mob Douzen no Akuyaku Reijou wa Dansou Shite Kouryaku Taishou no Za o Nerau ; The Villainess Who Is No Better than an Extra Cross-Dresses to Be a Love Interest
description:
Description :
        「That's right. I can become a potential love interest as well.」A ray of inspiration strikes, in an otome game where men are treated favorably, the side-villainess starts a crossdressing revolution!?The world is unfair. Just because I am an extra villainess, I'm doomed to always face the bad ending... If that's the case, can't I just dress up as a man and capture the heart of the game's heroine by becoming a potential love interest and live happily ever after?The fiancé with the temper of a kid; the tsundere classmate; the puppy-like brother-in-law; and the beautiful icy-hearted prince, they are all my rivals. Just wait and watch, you handsome heartthrobs! I, Elizabeth Burton, will become a seductive knight who'd softly whisper love and capture the hearts of maidens with a mischievous wink! A heartwarming school romance comedy, where a crossdressing lady aims to become a noble and a fabulous love interest, begins!
